description: They recognize that there are a lot more than just four seasons. They celebrate the seasons between the seasons. They welcome the slush, mud, and floods that can come from unpredictable weather all over the world. The Mudder has passed strict independent slip resistance testing with its superior surface traction, designed to perform on wet or dry surfaces. Through innovative technology, this boot was constructed to repel mud. Finally, all day comfort and support is achieved by our dual density footbed, with memory foam for a customized fit and a polyurethane foundation.
name: Muck Mudder Tall - Mens
